profile_summary:
As an Intermediate Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in building high-performance solutions utilizing **Go(lang)**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **gRPC**. My solid foundation in **software design**, combined with expertise in **MySQL**, **Redis**, and event monitoring with **Prometheus** and **Grafana**, enables me to develop robust applications tailored for scalability and reliability. Additionally, I am proficient in utilizing **CloudWatch** for monitoring and **CloudFlare** and **CloudFront** for improved application delivery.

My full-stack development experience encompasses front-end frameworks like **Angular** and back-end technologies such as **Node.js** and **Django**. I have a deep understanding of algorithms and data structures, ensuring the efficiency and performance of applications. With hands-on experience in CI/CD using **Jenkins**, I am committed to delivering quality code aligned with industry standards. I also possess strong skills in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** technologies, further supporting my versatile development capabilities.
